column4: hi... just installed to HD . Sound doesn't work, screen resolution doesn't give option of 1024x768, and my 'other' partition hde1 isn't displayed and won't mount. Any help would be appreciated!
son't panic, it's all fixable  . . .  .. just not by me :(
when you boot up, does grub give you an option to boot to windows?
you probably won't need the codepage or iocharset stuff
